quote: There's nothing in the world more silent than the telephone the morning after everybody pans your play. It won't ring from room service; your mother won't be calling you. If the phone has not rung by 8 in the morning, you're dead.
author: David Mamet

quote: I would bend over backward to be back on Grey's. Any day, I'll choose lying in bed with Katherine Heigl looking over me over getting thrown against walls by supernatural persons at 5 in the morning.
author: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quote: I am a New Yorker, and 7:00 A.M. is a civilized hour to finish the day, not to start it.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: You can find me at three in the morning in my living room with a glass of wine and really bad '90s trip hop beats blaring from my headphones.
author: Jenny Lewis

quote: I go to the gym at five in the morning and then go do a hike.
author: RuPaul

quote: My best writing is often early in the morning and, sometimes, while working out.
author: Greg Gutfeld

quote: As a child, I had to get up early for school or work. I'd get ready by myself. I'd set my alarm to wake me up very early in the morning, and be off to work, the family driver driving me every morning. I did it alone, my parents never coming in to wake me up.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: I remember coming to New York in 1974 to do a play here called 'Equis.' And I remember the first morning getting up and walking around the streets, and I thought, 'I'm home.' I felt really at peace here.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I do believe at the end of the night when you're with your family, the character gets hung up on the door like a coat, and is there to be taken on the next morning.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: 'Sunday Morning Coming Down' is probably the most directly autobiographical thing I'd written. In those days, I was living in a slum tenement that was torn down afterwards, but it was $25 a month in a condemned building, and 'Sunday Morning Coming Down' was more or less looking around me and writing about what I was doing.
author: Kris Kristofferson

quote: I always write 'Magic Potion' on my perfume bottles so when I use them, it feels magical - I make spells in the morning when I put them on.
author: Alexa Chung

quote: Exercising first thing in the morning ensures that you'll have the time for it, and it improves your self-control and energy levels all day long.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: I wake up at 5:30, 6 in the morning, but don't head into the office right away. I like to hang out with my wife, talk about things, get some coffee, you know.
author: Ice Cube

quote: I get up 5:30-6 every morning. I'm in the gym. I run a couple miles.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: I'm relieved that after all these years of doing atrocity work, I still cry my eyes out every time I read the paper in the morning. It's surprising, actually.
author: Samantha Power

quote: I'm going to marry a Jewish woman because I like the idea of getting up Sunday morning and going to the deli.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: I've become totally hooked on Cellex-C. It's an anti-ageing serum and is fantastic. I use it morning and evening and even on my hands, where it has faded those dark spots.
author: Joan Collins

quote: I always do an all-night horror marathon on Saturdays where we start at seven and go until five in the morning.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: It's man's work. My dad was gone at 4:30 in the morning and home at 8 at night, and he worked underground, and the last mine he worked in was 26 inches high in a lot of places. He liked the engineering of it - he liked the moving the earth and being able to extract something and put it back for reclamation. He enjoyed the whole process.
author: Chris Stapleton

quote: We only open a couple of presents on Christmas morning we're all about the stockings - we even get them for the dogs!
author: Darcey Bussell

quote: A lot of people love to do affirmations first thing in the morning - to keep themselves feeling peppy and positive.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: It seems every morning I wake up to face a list of 20 things to do, with time only to do 10, and somehow I always wind up squishing in 30.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: I remember trying to write at 1, 1:30 A.M., and just sort of falling asleep. And I think that was actually a good creative state for weird ideas. I shifted to a morning schedule once I had two kids, and I still found that if I slept badly, I actually had better ideas.
author: Whit Stillman

quote: I travel pretty frequently, but a few things that are routine are going for a run, getting my green tea in the morning, and checking email... well, all the time!
author: Payal Kadakia

quote: You should wake up in the morning and say, 'What do I want to do today? What's going to make me happy?'
author: Payal Kadakia

quote: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
author: Idina Menzel

quote: Some people never learn, no matter how much their heads hurt in the morning.
author: Doug Ducey

quote: Complex tasks are often better handled in the back of our mind, and that's often true of creative tasks - when you have something complex to deal with in writing or research or responding to an email. I'll start working, put it aside, and sometimes I'll wake up the next morning with a solution, or I'll find one when I exercise.
author: Adam Grant

quote: I try to sit still for about 15 minutes each morning without making lists or running in overdrive.
author: Alex Guarnaschelli

quote: I woke up one morning with the knowledge that I had a brain tumor. It wasn't so much that I dreamt I had a brain tumor; it was like someone just poured the knowledge into my head. It wasn't like an image; it was just like knowing. It was so weird, which is why I paid attention.
author: Mark Ruffalo

quote: There are so many songs in my heart and in my brain. I wake up at 2 in the morning, and I have to get up and sing them. There are so many of them, it's ridiculous.
author: Aaron Neville

quote: I get up in the morning. I usually do a radio interview early in the morning. I usually do a book signing, because I'm also a cookbook author, so I'm at some store, at a Walmart or a Williams Sonoma, for three hours, standing up, signing autographs, and taking pictures for three hours.
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: The reality is that you think you're going to have all this time out here, to do all this stuff, and the truth of the matter is, you just don't. If we're on the road, and we stay in the city we're in, I'm going to try to get up in the morning and get a workout in.
author: Trisha Yearwood

quote: Generally, when I wake up in the morning I set out a series of problems for myself and I write them down, and when I'm sleeping, my mind solves the problems. When I wake up in the morning, I have more clarity on the issue.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: People have to learn that everybody is the same. If you wake up in the morning, even if you're a movie star, you look like everybody else. The reality is that makeup is there to help. That's what it's for.
author: Francois Nars

quote: I used to get into bed with my mother every morning, almost until she died, and talk about everything. She was my closest confidante always. I had no secrets from her.
author: Miriam Margolyes

quote: My grandmother would start making her meat sauce at 7 in the morning on Sunday, and within five or six hours, that smell would be all through the house.
author: Jerry Della Femina

quote: Every morning when I wake up, I am grateful and happy that I come to the film set. It is home.
author: Arjun Kapoor

quote: I remember when I grew up and Dad would take me to kindergarten in the morning, and you could smell the chips in the air from the factory nearby.
author: Jens Lekman

quote: I'm big about washing my face before I go to bed, washing it when I wake up in the morning, getting good sleep and drinking a lot of water. Those are just easy things that you can do for your skin.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: I do devotion in the morning. I pray and I read the word.
author: Andra Day

quote: If I'm going to have baked goods in the morning, the rule is that I have to make them myself.
author: Jenny Slate

quote: Maybe I am a bit unusual here, but I am less stressed if I have my phone with me. Because I can spend like an hour in the morning taking care of everything instead of I sit there and wonder what I missed or wonder what's happening. So it's way less stressful for me to just answer my phone.
author: Sam Altman

quote: My morning starts with some form of exercise, and I give two hours - from 5:30 to 7:30 A.M. - to my personal fitness.
author: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I just go.
author: Savion Glover

quote: If yesterday was a good day's work, chances are you'll stay on a roll. And if you can stay on a roll, everything else will probably take care of itself - including not working from the moment you get up in the morning until you nod off to sleep.
author: Jason Fried

quote: I like being in movies that have a great story. I'm not so interested in being a Hollywood star. It's a job, you know. When you wake up at six in the morning every day for a week, it feels like hard work.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: If I get to a place early in the morning, I try to walk around by myself. I still try to find cool places to go to, like a record store in St. Louis or some restaurant in Chicago.
author: Yuna

quote: Until I really dealt with a lot of the demons in my life - the fear and self-doubt and unresolved issues with my old man - I could never feel fulfilled and happy. I would wake up in the morning and feel bad.
author: David Cassidy

quote: Sometimes you will do a close-up for a scene in the morning where you are totally distraught, then shoot the rest of that scene seven hours later. How do you hang on to that feeling all day without burning up, without going so far that you have nothing left to give when the cameras roll again?
author: Penelope Cruz

quote: I walk my dog every morning.
author: Chelsea Clinton

quote: At 14, I was the most disciplined guy around. I would get up at 5 o'clock in the morning and run five miles, and then go to school. Sometimes I would run behind the school bus, and the kids thought I was just crazy. I knew what I wanted.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: It takes people being alone in front of the computer at three in the morning to write opinions about movies, apparently.
author: Jeff Nichols

quote: No, ramen's not good for you. But in Japan, our favorite thing to do after drinking all night, especially in Sapporo where it's freezing cold, is to go to the ramen place at two, three in the morning.
author: Cary Fukunaga

quote: I get work done in half the time if the family is still asleep. When my family wakes up, I've already had a productive morning and am ready to enjoy breakfast with them before I start conquering the rest of my day.
author: John Rampton

quote: My marriage to David Bailey ended one morning in 1983, while he was away on a photo-shoot.
author: Marie Helvin

quote: I'm a firm believer that if you put together a good product that is just good policy, that is embraced by both sides so that it is seen as politically advantageous to the Republicans or Democrats, that even in this very polarized partisan world that you can advance legislation. I have to believe that, or I wouldn't want to get up every morning.
author: Lisa Murkowski

quote: In the morning, I usually get up between 7:40 A.M. and 7:45 A.M., and then I'll brush my teeth, do my hair, and just throw on my leotard and my clothes and go to the kitchen.
author: Simone Biles

quote: I think glamour all the time. I wake up in the morning and I'm already thinking glamour.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: Every morning, I make myself a cappuccino with a drawing in the foam. I post them to Instagram with the hashtag #christiecappuccino.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: I like coffee in the morning and decaf green tea throughout the day... When I was younger and modeling, to kick-start a diet I would do a juice cleanse.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: If we bought everything on the Internet, our eyes and mouths and nostrils would probably begin to film over with a tegument - one initially tissue-thin and capable of being removed each morning, but which gradually thickened and hardened until we were imprisoned in our own tiny minds.
author: Will Self

quote: People get emails from me at 3 in the morning.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: I always run in the morning on an empty stomach, and I'll go through a bottle and a half of water. Then I have a protein drink or I eat egg whites.
author: Drew Carey

quote: One is a painter because one wants so-called freedom one doesn't want to go to the office every morning.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: My father was a Baptist preacher, and he used to read the King James Bible to me every single morning. He made me memorize it and repeat verses at night before I went to sleep.
author: Jay Parini

quote: I like to try to do a little work before I do anything in the morning, even if it's a paragraph.
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: My personality, when tasked with creating meals, goes something like this: Is there a way we can make this more difficult? Because let's do that. I don't mean to complicate things. It's just - why buy pre-packaged potato salad when you can spend your morning boiling potatoes and flipping out because there's no dill in the house?
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: If you woke up each morning, and immediately dwelt on your ills, what sort of a day could you look forward to?
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: I try to make films that I find exciting. It makes me want to get out of bed at five in the morning, have my make-up done and play for the rest of the day.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: Making films can be absolutely fantastic, but it can also be incredibly dull. You spend the whole day sitting by yourself in your trailer and then you get called to deliver one sentence - then you're told to come back and do it again at 5:30 the following morning.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: We're the roughest people in the way we play and live, and that is because Americans come from people who all got up one morning and went 5,000 miles, and that was a time in the 19th century when it wasn't so easy to do.
author: Alan Furst

quote: 'Morning Joe' host Mika Brzezinski's personal life is a minefield. Her father is Zbigniew Brzezinski, former national security adviser to President Jimmy Carter, and while one brother is an Obama appointee, the other advises Romney.
author: Campbell Brown

quote: I'm very neurotic about shaving. I shave first thing in the morning before a shoot, and if I have dinner that night, I have to shave again.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: I can't sleep without the TV on, so we leave it on during the night, and that's what wakes me up - Joe Scarborough and 'Morning Joe' at 7:30 or 8.
author: Chrissy Teigen

quote: I've been there a thousand years, and I never felt comfortable. Beverly Hills - when I first saw it, I thought they put it up this morning. You got to pack water to get to the drugstore.
author: Peter Falk

quote: My father's whole life was work. He had a retail store in Ossining, New York, and I mean, he was down there at 6:15 every morning. The store didn't open until 9, but he hadda be down there. That's all he knew.
author: Peter Falk

quote: I don't like getting up in the morning, getting in a car, driving on a freeway, and stopping at a gate where two guards are standing there, then walk into a studio that looks like a bunch of airplane hangars.
author: Peter Falk

quote: Obama is the New Generation and the hot light of a dawn that goes way beyond clever talk of morning in America.
author: John Ridley

quote: I hear that 5 o'clock whistle in my mind like Fred Flintstone and I have to stop. I'm also not much of a morning writer. I have a sweet spot from about 11am to 4pm. But I really work during that time.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: You numb yourself so you're not terrified when you're on TV at 7 o'clock in the morning with Justin Bieber, who you just met a couple of days before, having to perform in front of millions of people.
author: Halsey

quote: I love stretching in the morning. It's the first thing I do when I wake up because getting a good back-crack is so extremely satiating. I feel taller when I finally stand.
author: Rachel Nichols

quote: I'm actually one of those people who get up energetic in the morning.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: I can only tell you that eggs, country ham, biscuits, a pot of coffee, a morning paper, a table by the window overlooking the veranda and putting green, listening to the idle chitchat of competitors, authors, wits and philosophers, hasn't exactly been a torturous way to begin each day at the Masters all these years.
author: Dan Jenkins

quote: I literally have meetings at eight o'clock in the morning, and I finish at nine o'clock at night. It sounds pathetic, but I don't even have time to go shopping.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: I listen to Ustad Vilayat Khan's 'Raga Khamaj' and 'Raga Jaijaiwanti' virtually every morning, a lot of Abdullah Ibrahim, Michael Kiwanuka, Savages, and contemporary Ugandan pop.
author: Mira Nair

quote: I became a musician so I wouldn't have to get up at 6 in the morning.
author: Norah Jones

quote: Scorpions like holes. We had to put our arms in the holes to dig out the smelting residues. We always performed critter checks before an excavation, but one morning, I put an arm in and felt a sharp pierce. When I brought my hand out, it was red and already swelling.
author: Sarah Parcak

quote: It didn't matter what you look like. You don't have to get up at 5:30 in the morning and there's a lot to be said for that. Corpse Bride can just play all my parts from now on and I'll just do the voice.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: I get up early in the morning, 4 o'clock, and I sit at my desk and what I do is just dream. After three or four hours, that's enough. In the afternoon, I run.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: My job starts at a quarter to seven in the morning, and you go right through until whatever time is necessary to finish up.
author: Enda Kenny

quote: I procrastinate all morning. That's when I get my office work done and answer e-mails and see what's on the Internet and do laundry.
author: Kate Christensen

quote: Emily Gannett is tireless. I know this because I have traded emails with her at 2 A.M. only to later wake blearily to a chipper morning missive sent south of 6 A.M. before her morning run.
author: Rachel Sklar

quote: Yeah, I'm not really a morning person.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: It's very exciting... what DeAndre brings to the game is truly special. To have the opportunity to play with a football player like that, that's what gets a quarterback out of bed in the morning.
author: Brock Osweiler

quote: Cross the wrong state border with your gun, or wake up one morning to new legislation or a new presidential executive order, and suddenly you're the bad guy, not the good guy. No wonder some gun owners seem so touchy; they feel, at some level, like criminals in waiting.
author: Walter Kirn

quote: Even if I have already peaked, I have to believe I can improve. I wake up every morning, and go to practice, with the illusion that I'm going to get better that day.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: I was passionate about soccer. I still am. Odd, though - playing soccer always made me much more anxious than playing tennis. On soccer days, I'd be out of bed by 6 in the morning, all nervous. But I was always calm when it was time for a tennis match. I still don't know why.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Sometimes I wake up in the morning and I am like, 'This is a high-top day' or 'This is a bob day,' but when I get my clothes on that's when I see.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: I had the perfect job for a gamer. From February to October, I'd get up at 7 in the morning with nothing to do but play games until I had to be at the park around 1 or 2 o'clock. When I got back after the game, I played until 3 or 4 in the morning.
author: Curt Schilling

quote: Every NASCAR driver watches Formula One in the morning they are well informed.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: At my wedding, I was dancing so furiously that I fell hard on my kneecaps. The next morning, my knees were so swollen that I had to get a wheelchair at the airport to go on my honeymoon.
author: Casey Wilson

quote: I only discovered the 'Harry Potter' series in my tenth standard. I dived right into it, often reading non-stop through the day and night. It was the morning after one such readathon when I was to appear for a Chemistry exam. Spending my night with the third edition of Harry Potter didn't help much, and I fared poorly.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: I was in Shanghai when the Japanese invaded China. I was there in Shanghai when, the morning after Pearl Harbor, they seized Shanghai.
author: J. G. Ballard

quote: We are shallow because our media are so horribly shallow. Every morning, I peruse the papers, and there is so little to read in them. It is the same with radio - all that noise, that artifice.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: I'm not a person who naturally loves to wake up in the morning and go 'Yeah, I'm going to work out for five hours - wooh!' Like, that's not my thing. I'm from Texas. I like to eat carbs. I like to chill out with my friends and do anything but 150 push-ups and sit-ups.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: I'm a late riser by my family's standards. Sleeping is a luxury because since I was young, I woke up very early to go ice-skating. So I'm really not a morning girl.
author: Vera Wang

quote: If you do cardio one day and the next day you can do weights, do it that way. If you need to do it at night or in the morning, do it that way. Whatever you need to get it done, just get it done.
author: LL Cool J

quote: When I was a child I had a nightmare, and in the morning, I asked my mother and father, 'If I kill someone, would you still love me?' My parents were very preoccupied with this, but I think I'm not the only one to ask for that - not love, but absolute fidelity.
author: Claire Denis

quote: In these days a man is nobody unless his biography is kept so far posted up that it may be ready for the national breakfast-table on the morning after his demise.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: I show up in my writing room at approximately 10 A.M. every morning without fail. Sometimes my muse sees fit to join me there and sometimes she doesn't, but she always knows where I'll be. She doesn't need to go hunting in the taverns or on the beach or drag the boulevard looking for me.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Making love in the morning got me through morning sickness. I found I could be happy and throw up at the same time.
author: Pamela Anderson

quote: I'm the guy that gets up at three in the morning to jot down an entire sheet of lyrics for something that won't be recorded for six months. You have to get it down when you can, because thoughts are fluid.
author: Corey Taylor

quote: With Saturday morning cartoons, you've got to start at 6 A.M., right?
author: Jim Rash

quote: I go to yoga every day. I meditate every morning.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: Let me tell you, it is still morning in America. It just happens to be kind of a head pounding, hung over for four hours in America - and it's shaping up to be a nasty day, but its still morning in America.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: I have an orthopedic pillow that's made out of a sponge material. I have a plate in my throat, and I have to be careful or I could end up with a bad neck in the morning. That pillow is a must everywhere I go.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: I never think of yesterday. Can't do anything about it. I'm a positive guy. When you really deep down look at it, we go to bed every night, get up every morning, stay here for 70 or 80 years, and then we die.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: My father-in-law gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning and watches the Discovery Channel. I don't know why there's this big rush to do this.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: I generally blog between 5:30 A.M. and 7 A.M. I will from time to time add something during the day, but for the most part blogging is an early morning activity for me.
author: Fred Wilson

quote: If you read about Mussolini or Stalin or some of these other great monsters of history, they were at it all the time, that they were getting up in the morning very early. They were physically very active. They didn't eat lunch.
author: A. N. Wilson

quote: I used to start at about 10 at night and work until early morning. My preferred way to work is to start in the early afternoon and work until about 3, go do errands, have dinner, and then write for a few more hours in the evening.
author: Mary Gaitskill

quote: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves; most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
author: Lewis Thomas

quote: I work all day, morning and afternoon, just about every day. If I sit there like that for two or three years, at the end I have a book.
author: Philip Roth

quote: Do I get up every morning and ask: am I doing the things that I believe in and am I doing them for the best possible motives? Yes. Unambiguously yes.
author: Nick Clegg

quote: I usually decide what to wear in the morning, but sometimes, I'll have a favorite coat or sweater or shoes, and I'll wear them everyday for a week!
author: Cameron Russell

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I like to refresh myself and put some tonic on - one with vitamin C - and then an oxygen cream with vitamins A, C, and E. That's very important to me so that my skin will stay moisturized throughout the day.
author: Melania Trump

quote: I don't mind traveling that much when I can go somewhere and stay there for a while, but touring is different. You rarely see anything. You get there early in the morning and you're resting all day, and you go in and do a sound check, and you do the show, and then bam you're gone.
author: George Strait

quote: It has not been easy to wake up every single day at 6:30 in the morning to then head to the gym and start a full day of work. But you have to have that kind of dedication if you want to achieve the goals you have set for yourself.
author: Pablo Sandoval

quote: When you stand up in the morning, you look in the mirror and say, 'I'm black.' No. You wake up and you see yourself as a human being in the world, but you raise discussion and raise aggression, the anger that you confront every day of your life, whether you want to or not.
author: Raoul Peck

quote: I'd always been a news junkie, always read lots of newspapers and watched the Sunday morning news shows on TV and felt strongly about issues of power, control, sexuality and race.
author: Barbara Kruger

quote: It's always morning for me until 4 in the afternoon.
author: Luis Fonsi

quote: Every little detail of my life is, and has always been, surrounded by fashion - from the cup I drink my coffee from in the morning to my constant travels - fashion always pops up somewhere and somehow.
author: Margherita Missoni

quote: I would do the morning show and then just walk over to the network side of the building here at ABC in New York and sit down and start it up again and introduce the 10 contestants, and then introduce the 10 - the fastest finger question, and pick one of them, put them in the seat before you finally got to asking them the questions.
author: Regis Philbin

quote: I keep wondering at night, 'Will I have a bank the next morning, or will some technology company be doing banking without needing a bank?'
author: Uday Kotak

quote: I can't say for sure where I was headed the first time my mom put a blue blazer on me. Church, probably. West Side Presbyterian in Ridgewood, New Jersey, specifically, where my blazer was paired with a clip-on tie and a pair of khakis for a Sunday morning with my fellow congregants.
author: Willie Geist

quote: Landing on 'Morning Joe' wasn't a fluke. I was a poli sci major in college. I interned at the CBS political unit, covered conventions.
author: Willie Geist

quote: I'm a morning bird. I love getting up before it's light out if it's possible. I wake up, I have a black coffee. I'm an 86-year-old man. I try to work out first thing to get it over with. When I do it, I feel good because I have the endorphins all day.
author: Ellie Kemper

quote: Sydney in general is eclectic. You can be on that brilliant blue ocean walk in the morning and then within 20 minutes you can be in a completely vast suburban sprawl or an Italian or Asian suburb, and it's that mix of people, it's that melting pot of people that give it its vital personality.
author: Baz Luhrmann

quote: In order to have good fried chicken, you should wash and season the bird the morning you're preparing it for dinner. Don't wait and do it right before you start cooking. Throw it in the refrigerator, seasoned, that morning, and give it a chance to soak up all the salt and pepper and goodness.
author: Paula Deen

quote: I am so blessed. I've been way over-blessed. At 64 years old, I look forward to going to bed every night so I can wake up in the morning and see what blessing is going to come my way that day. Because you never, ever know what God's got in store for you.
author: Paula Deen

quote: My dad, he worked rebar, an ironworker. Watching my pops get up every single morning, going into work, working hard - I think that really made me want to work that hard, wanted to make me get up early and go for a run or get a lift in or get some extra hitting in and really try to better myself every day.
author: Bryce Harper

quote: Whereas I used to get depressed or neurotic or dwell on things, I see my son's bright eyes and smile in the morning, and suddenly, I don't feel like I'm depressed anymore. There's nothing to be depressed about when you've got that.
author: Corey Feldman

quote: When you're doing a medieval show like 'Pillars,' it starts off a bit like a school play. You're all in funny costumes; you've had your coffee, and you say, 'Good morning'. Then you go on set and, if you've got good actors and directors, it takes on a life of its own.
author: Ian McShane

quote: I am a bit obsessive about tidiness. I need to make my bed in the morning and leave it perfectly made up.
author: Kiefer Sutherland

quote: To keep my back from getting stiff, I have a strict regime every morning of stretching and do yoga once a week and Pilates. 'Strictly Come Dancing' in 2008 was great for my fitness.
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: Those golden minutes before you are completely awake, when your mind is just drifting, you have no censorship; you are ready to develop any kind of idea. That's when I come up with the best and worst ideas. That is the privilege of being a writer - that you can stay in bed for an hour in the morning and it's work time.
author: Jo Nesbo

quote: The time I spend in the morning - praying, sipping coffee, and coming up with my list - is a ritual I relish. I have done it for so long now that I subconsciously measure whether or not the things I'm doing match with what I should be doing, what I want to be doing, and the life I want to live.
author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: The question is the morning after. What sort of Iraq do we wake up to after the bombing? What happens in the region? What impact could it have? These are questions leaders I have spoken to have posed.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Like all Americans, I will never forget where I was the morning of the 9/11 attacks.
author: Kirsten Gillibrand

quote: For me, I exercise every morning. I exercise every day. I work out about an hour and 20 minutes, which is aerobics and resistance training. I work on agility and balance. I work on the things that are going to help my condition. I do agility training. I walk on a treadmill. I use an elliptical. I use weights.
author: Montel Williams

quote: If you are a girl dressing up in the morning thinking about the whole world having a point of view on what you are wearing, it takes the pleasure out of getting dressed.
author: Olivier Theyskens

quote: The morning is always my best time of the day for writing because that's when my head is best.
author: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: What I don't like is breakfast in the morning. I have a double-espresso cappuccino, but no food.
author: Wolfgang Puck

quote: I used to wake up in the morning and say, 'Oh, God.' Now I wake up in the morning and look forward to life.
author: Steven Adler

quote: I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
author: Bruce Willis

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel like a billionaire without paying taxes.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: I am really passionate about my career and my music and I am so lucky to be able to do what I do for a job, so for all the early morning starts and long days, I could never trade it all in.
author: Rachel Stevens

quote: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
author: Gina Carano

quote: A locked-room problem lies at the heart of my new novel, 'In The Morning I'll Be Gone,' in which an RUC detective has to find out whether a publican's daughter who fell off a table in a bar that was locked from the inside was in fact murdered.
author: Adrian McKinty

quote: 'Old times' never come back and I suppose it's just as well. What comes back is a new morning every day in the year, and that's better.
author: George Edward Woodberry

quote: I'll always remember when I bumped into Good Morning America's Robin Roberts on a flight to my mother's funeral in 1994, and how kind she was during that difficult time.
author: Gayle King

quote: It's frightening to think about more sanctions. When I've met North Koreans in China, they've said to me, 'You have no idea how difficult our lives are. We live like dogs.' They wake up in the morning wondering what they're going to eat for dinner.
author: Barbara Demick

quote: I spent many a summer early morning with the radio very low, half sleeping and half listening.
author: Frankie Valli

quote: You say something stupid and the next morning you're in the headlines.
author: Barry Manilow

quote: I get up in the morning, look around, arrange and rearrange things, and imagine how I might like them to look. Why doesn't everybody?
author: Anouska Hempel

quote: I started playing poker in 2003 during my pregnancy, to distract myself from my awful morning sickness. For months all I did was cry and play Texas Hold'em.
author: Cheryl Hines

quote: I write early in the morning. I just wake up whenever I feel awake and I have to be sitting and writing pretty soon after that. If I take too long to think about the impossibility of what I'm trying to, I'll be defeated by it.
author: Tim Cahill

quote: My morning routine is quite common: I have breakfast at home while reading the newspaper, I take a shower, get dressed, a spray of cologne, and I am ready to go!
author: Domenico Dolce

quote: If a woman gets insomnia, you never know where you're going to find her furniture the next morning. It's primal. We have so little we can control, but we can perfect the way our room looks.
author: Nicole Holofcener

quote: Chronic malnutrition, or the lack of proper nutrition over time directly contributes to three times as many child deaths as food scarcity. Yet surprisingly, you don't really hear about this hidden crisis through the morning news, Twitter or headlines of major newspapers.
author: Cat Cora

quote: A large amount of constant activity will get things going. For example, training in the morning will have everything, all the juices flowing by the time you actually get to work. So, when you're at work, you've been already up for an hour or so or two hours, and you're raring to go where everyone else is still wiping sleep out of their eyes.
author: Henry Cavill

quote: I'm a morning person, so rising at 4-something on weekends is not a huge challenge for me. I am not, however, much of a morning eater - not at that hour, at least.
author: Lester Holt

quote: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.
author: Jessica Chastain

quote: Your body knows how old you are, but if you keep on and you take care of yourself - you know, I go to kickboxing class every morning at 5 A.M. You know, try to do all the things to take care of the outside of your body, but you also should do - and have to do things that take care of the inside of your body.
author: Darlene Love

quote: I don't have to get up in the morning and go beat up my body like I used to. I don't have to be out there in August in 108 degree weather down in Texas.
author: Emmitt Smith

quote: Holiday? Is like, what? I'm a hyperactive girl, so it may be boring for me to be on the beach doing nothing. I just need to find a place for three weeks and work but sleep in the morning, maybe write a little bit, have a glass of red wine. That's my perfect holiday.
author: Melanie Laurent

quote: A young dog's faith is absolute... Dogs are notorious for hope. Dogs believe that this morning, this very morning, may begin a day of fascination, easily grander than any day in the past.
author: Donald McCaig

quote: Beverly Hills is too intimidating. Everyone's got lovely teeth, so you don't want to smile. Everyone's ripped, so you start working out at 4 in the morning and eating egg white omelets.
author: Rob James-Collier

quote: My principal motivation is supporting my family, which is not a bad reason for getting up in the morning. That's always been my motivation - to take care of the people who rely on me.
author: Tony Parsons

quote: My wife gets pampered pretty well. She's had me trained since she was pregnant, when I started making her oatmeal with fresh berries every morning.
author: Michael Weatherly

quote: The Weezer 'Blue' Album is a classic. I think My Morning Jacket's 'Circuital' is a great album to have. Any Led Zeppelin album. Pink Floyd 'The Dark Side Of The Moon' or 'Animals.' I always catch myself at concerts being like, 'Oh, I just stared at the drummer for 15 straight minutes.' I study them.
author: Christopher Mintz-Plasse

quote: There are 435 members of Congress. There's one 'Morning Joe' show. Hopefully, we can keep hammering the argument that you can disagree with other people and have debates but remain civil.
author: Joe Scarborough

quote: If some great catastrophe is not announced every morning, we feel a certain void. Nothing in the paper today, we sigh.
author: Lord Acton
